summary: Reupload of a mod that was taken down from nexus a long time ago with a little modifications from me as well xD
descriptionHtml:
Its a re-upload of a combat mod that was a removed a few years back

also if you don't like the slow time effect type in Set Dcpconfig to 1 and you can toggle it off thru the menu

what it does

adds special killmove animations to your Power attacks after you stacked up combo points(by your swings)
then unleash a combo attack by using a Power attack which will trigger a chain combo which will vary in effect depending on the direction of the power attack(can even be activated with 1 combo point but the more combo points you stack up the stronger the benefit of the attack)


Recommended
Tk Combat - you should get this lol seriously it allows you to chain extra combos and reset the animation too allowing for much quicker and precise combos since you can knock them down as well

Elysees Tempest - for the added Flashiness

Elysees Stinger- Just incase you need to get closer to your opponent XD


Note: Please Watch the Video i linked for a preview xD

P.S start a new game for the scripts to take full effect
 

Credits-  3Jiou original creator of this mod and also creator of deadly dragons :)
author: Huiop21
